name: Blockade (itch) (RCMC)
description:
This simple yet addictive game will keep you on your toes as streams of blocks rush toward you.

EVADE OR FACE THE CONSEQUENCES...

As you complete levels, the difficulty and length will increase, enabling you to have a more engaging and enjoyable experience.

The vibrant colour scheme and music create an immersive scene, making you more focused.

This game is still in development so expect more levels.

If you have any feedback please leave a comment on this post.

CONTROLS

"A "to move left.

"D" to move right.
